name: LEFT 2 DIE
description:
"Left 2 Die" is a heart-racing and immersive escape room game developed by two friends. Players find themselves trapped in an abandoned place with a series of creepy, run-down houses. The game is designed to give players a spine-chilling experience with its horror vibes and eerie setting.

To escape the place, players must solve a series of puzzles and find the code to the main gate. The code is hidden in the various houses scattered throughout the game. Players must explore each of these houses, solve clues and puzzles, and collect items that will lead them closer to the main code. The gameplay is challenging yet rewarding, as players must use their skills and intellect to navigate through the abandoned houses and finally escape.

The game requires a Windows 10 or 11 operating system, a minimum of 8GB RAM, and a dedicated graphics card. With 500MB of storage, "Left 2 Die" is designed to run smoothly on most computers. It is the perfect game for fans of horror, escape rooms, and puzzles. Get ready for an unforgettable adventure through the abandoned houses and discover the secrets that they hold. Can you survive and escape "Left 2 Die"?
